item.description:
Hi Meetup Members

Every Thursday, One of our member take place the Jazz event in Boston.
Their playing make us be fun through the great musics.
Would you like to spend a great time with us and your friends?

Where
ICARUS Restaurant
3 Appleton Street, Boston MA
http://www.icarusrest...

How

It's located at the corner of Tremont and Appleton Street in Boston.
That's a short walk from the Back Bay Station (Orange Line)
or between Copley Station and Arlington Station (Green Line)

Members
Keigo Hirakawa - Piano
Matt Hogan - Bass

Schedule
19:00～20:00　Talking/Eating a dinner
20:00～21:00　Free time(Listening some Jazz)

Iâ€™m looking forward to enjoying with Meetup members!!
Sincerely to you.
item.name: Jazz Music Night
